normalised: baat khatam hui, apnay jism ki suniye aur apni training ko uskay mutabiq adjust karen. dard se dhakka nahi lagana ya zyada training ki alamaat ko nazar andaaz nahi karna. aik ahli coach aur sports physiotherapist ke sath kaam karne ki sifarish ki jati hai. key performance indicators ( k p aies ) ki regular monitoring, yahan tak ke running times ya resting dil ki raftar jaisi aasaan cheezein bhi progress ko track karne aur mumkina masail ki shanakht mein madad kar sakti hain. yaad rakhen, musalsal koshish aur aik behtar mansoobah bandi karna aakhir-kaar nataij nikalta hai.
